bibl.title: Late Roman Papyri from the Michigan Collection.
bibl.note: 1. P. Mich. Inv. 197. Request for Parathesis. Arsinoe, 5 April A.D. 298. - 2. Inv. 1387. Excerpt from Land Declarations. Karanis, before A.D. 302. - 3. Inv. 393. Receipts for "time purou". Philadelphia, Aug./Nov. A.D. 304. - 4. Inv. 402. Receipt for Barley. Philadelphia, early 4th cent. A.D. - 5. Inv. 1386. Account of Tax Payments. Karanis, ca. A.D. 330-340. - 6. Inv. 6453. Account of Deliveries. Karanis, ca. A.D. 312.
bibl.seg: Browne Gerald M., Late Roman Papyri from the Michigan Collection.
